text:
Learn how to find the percentage of a population

[imath] \mathcal{U} [/imath]\n() A company conducted a taste test of its new soft drink. From the 1250 participants 800 like the soft drink. From the remaining participants [imath] 40 \% [/imath] dislike this soft drink and the rest were undecided.\nHow many participants in the taste test were undecided about the new soft drink?
